mapper.insert: insert into submission ( id, helper_id, name, short_description, full_description, search_tags, shop_type, open_hours, district, address, phone, latitude1000000, longitude1000000, photo_url ) values ( #{id}::uuid, #{helperId}::uuid, #{name}, #{shortDescription}, #{fullDescription}, #{searchTags}, #{shopType}::shop_type, #{openHours}, #{district}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{latitude1000000}, #{longitude1000000}, #{photoUrl} )
mapper.select: select id, helper_id as helperId, name, short_description as shortDescription, full_description as fullDescription, search_tags as searchTags, shop_type as shopType, open_hours as openHours, district, address, phone, latitude1000000, longitude1000000, photo_url as photoUrl from submission where id = #{id}::uuid
